backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining the backend for a scratch-and-win app, with endpoints for submitting coupon claims, managing user profiles, querying/filtering submissions, and marking coupons as redeemed, using an in-memory Map for storage and role-based access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two implemented features: updating reward probability distribution in rewardGenerator.ts and handling the 'Better Luck Next Time' outcome gracefully across ScratchCard, ScratchPage, and RewardReveal components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files, describing the purpose and key implementation details of each component, hook, utility, and page in the Vitalis Water scratch-and-win frontend.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS entry point that imports Tailwind directives and defines CSS custom property tokens for light and dark themes covering colors, borders, charts, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the Vitalis Water Scratch & Win app, mounting the React app at the #root div and loading the main TypeScript entry point as an ES module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing navigation between ScratchPage and AdminPanel views, handling admin authentication via sessionStorage, and syncing view state with browser history via popstate events.
Modal dialog component for admin login that validates hardcoded email/password credentials and calls onSuccess or displays an error message accordingly.
frontend/src/components/ClaimForm.tsx: Glassmorphism claim form component that collects state, city, UPI ID, and feedback from the user, submits the claim via a React Query mutation, and shows a success confirmation or user-friendly error message.
frontend/src/components/Confetti.tsx: Renders a canvas-based confetti animation with particles when `triggered` is true, and plays a winning chime sound once on trigger.
frontend/src/components/ConfirmationNoti: Displays an animated modal notification confirming a reward payment with a checkmark, ripple effect, coin animations, and auto-closes after 6 seconds.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with the Vitalis logo, copyright year, tagline, and a referral link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Displays the hero section with a 'Scan. Scratch. Win.' tagline, a bottle image with emoji fallback, and a subtitle.
frontend/src/components/Logo.tsx: Renders the Vitalis Water logo image with a text/emoji fallback and an optional double-click handler.
frontend/src/components/RewardReveal.tsx: Shows a reward card displaying the won amount in rupees and a button to scroll down to the claim form.
frontend/src/components/ScratchCard.tsx: Renders an interactive scratch card using a canvas overlay that reveals either a cash reward or a 'better luck' result once 60% is scratched.
frontend/src/components/WaterDropIntro.t: Animates a full-screen canvas intro with falling water drops over a gradient background for ~2.2 seconds, then calls `onComplete`.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (anonymous or authenticated) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login, logout, and identity persistence across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including user profiles, claim submissions, and admin operations, with canister-stopped error normalization.
frontend/src/hooks/useScratchCanvas.ts: Custom hook that manages a scratch-card canvas, handling drawing, pointer events, progress calculation, and triggering a reveal callback when a configurable threshold of the overlay is scratched away.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining Tailwind directives, CSS design tokens (colors, radii, brand variables), and component-level styles for the scratch card UI including backgrounds, card faces, and typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin dashboard page displaying all submissions with filtering/stats, and a coupon verification panel that allows searching by code and marking submissions as redeemed.
frontend/src/pages/ScratchPage.tsx: Main user-facing page orchestrating the scratch card flow: intro animation, scratch interaction, reward reveal, claim form, confetti, confirmation notification, and admin login modal.
frontend/src/utils/audioGenerator.ts: Utility module that generates and plays procedural scratch noise and winning chime sounds using the Web Audio API.
frontend/src/utils/rewardGenerator.ts: Generates weighted random reward outcomes (₹10/₹20/₹30/₹100 or 'better luck') and unique coupon codes in the format VW-XXXX-XXXX.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom fonts, colors (including brand 'vitalis' palette), shadows, border radii, and keyframe animations for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project state document describing a mobile-first Scratch & Win reward site for 'Vitalist Water', including architecture notes, reward probabilities, known issues, and a list of existing features.
